item.title: A validated asymptotic thermomechanical model for air-gap formation in tapered moulds in the continuous casting of steel

item.title: The Figure Shortcode
item.description: Hugo has figure shortcode built-in, so you can easily add figure captions or hyperlink rel attributes to images.

item.title: Analysis of a model for the formation of fold-type oscillation marks in the continuous casting of steel
item.description: My latest work has been published in the IMA Journal of Applied Mathematics.

item.title: PhD Graduation
item.description: In February 2020, I completed my PhD thesis. My PhD study was on mathematical modelling of continuous steel casting.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a postdoctoral researcher in applied and industrial mathematics, currently researching the modelling of anodes in lithium ion batteries as part of the Si-Drive international consortium.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you wish to contact me, use the icon links to my social channels and email.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Guide to Thumbnails in Hugo
item.description: Thumbnails can be enabled easily by setting the thumbnail parameter in the frontmatter to an image such as "images/landscape.
